name: L.I.F.E.
description:
L.I.F.E. Is a 3D Strategy Horror Game based in a setting 4,000 feet underwater, in which you should be alone. You're all the way down there to complete an investigation issued by your boss to repair the establishment and get it running again, as well as sending as much information back up to your colleagues at the surface.  The title is easily mistaken to be called "life" but those letters don't even represent a fraction of what 'L.I.F.E.' Actually means.

The game presents 'Lore Mode' AKA 'Story Mode', as well as several other fun and tricky mini-games that you can brag about when and if you complete them. 

Details: 

- Average playtime for the story mode is 1-2 Days.

- Average playtime for the entire game is about a week. (Those last few mini-games are very tricky!)

- The default screen resolution is 1280x720, and shouldn't be changeable, but if you do find a way to change the resolution, the UI (buttons, images and text) will glitch for 30% of the resolutions. If your custom resolution is within that margin, just change the resolution back to 1980x720 :)

- If you find any bugs, please tell me (Developer Jake) at my business email >> soulringshallcome@gmail.com along with a picture(s)/video(s) of the error. Thanks!

-
